website_summaries.verdict: If you’re concerned about your home’s plumbing and want to be able to shut off your water remotely, Flo can give you the peace of mind you want.
pros: Flo gives you real-time stats for your plumbing system and the option to shut off your water remotely from anywhere you have an internet connection
cons: Flo is expensive, and while it can tell you a lot about your water, it can’t pinpoint where a leak originated

customer_reviews.title: Use their installer or get no warranty
customer_reviews.text: If you do not use one of their installers this product has no warranty. That is an absolutely horrible policy! This is about the simplest thing to install and yet they don’t let you do that.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, some software issues.
customer_reviews.text: We travel a lot and my home is monitored for security. Water was the one issue that concerned me. The Flo unit is great except for a few flaws. We have a pool with an automatic fill and a swamp cooler. The learning process is currently 7 days. We live in the desert and our warm season is just beginning. My water use this month will be drastically different than last month. The learning period should be longer or continuous.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Davies

customer_reviews.title: Installation was simple
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple. Total installation from internet connection to installing the device on the water line was less than 45 mins, with the use of 2 push to connect fittings. 1hr later, we’ve use 79 gallons of water. I’m excited the see what this device can tell me.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Sackett

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work with all Wi-Fi networks
customer_reviews.text: Product has issues connecting with newer wi-do systems such as Google. Ultimately, I had to return for another competitive product that would work with more technologies. Good concept, but likely needs a few newer versions before ready for the masses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tech support
customer_reviews.text: Love this, keeps great records and lets you know where your $ is going while protecting the home.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie D Bemis

customer_reviews.title: Avoid, poor design
customer_reviews.text: Shipper was fast and accurate. This is a poorly designed product. Installed, it dripped from the top connection end. Called tech support, was told to loosen the connector, then had a fast running leak. Could not resolve. Had to remove it to get safe running water in the house. Unable to obtain a resolution. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Secured
customer_reviews.text: Installation wasn't too hard, a couple glitches. Recently, I was renovating my kitchen and had the main shut off. I turned it back on at the end of the day to shower and woke up to a soggy kitchen cabinet and floor where my supply shut off was leaking (I hadn't reinstalled the faucet yet). I wish I had FLO for that. Now that I do have it, I'm happy knowing that if my washer line bursts or a pipe freezes (or I do another project) that it will catch it and shut down before there is too much damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Nightmare. Absolutely crazy device. Inaccurate readings. Keeps shutting off because readings are inaccurate. More trouble than its worth.
customer_reviews.author: Larry N. English

customer_reviews.title: Evidently it's an effective device
customer_reviews.text: After a water leak damage episode at our house the insurance company said we must install the Moen to keep our policy. It also adds points to our policy. The plumber I use had no trouble installing it, and I suppose its working. I feel like it must have a track record or the insurance company would not have endorsed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wifi meter but wish it came with a 1" connector
customer_reviews.text: Working great for about 2 months now. Love the app and alerts in the email. I wish I could configure multiple units in a single login. The plumber informed that it will throttle the 1" pipe flow as it reduces flow to 3/4". I contacted tech support and they didn't offer 1" connectors (which I wish they did). I searched Lowes, HomeDepot & online but couldn't find it and thus had to return 2 of the 3 units I purchased. I wish they would sell other size connectors on Amazon or their website to make this process easier.
customer_reviews.author: JesusWasAMuslim

customer_reviews.title: Surprised me (in good way)
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my wife was worried about a plumbing leak destroying house while we were out. I didn’t think there was much need, but I quickly learned I was wrong. Installation is pretty easy for someone with general DIY experience. Few weeks after it was installed, I got an alert that it was shutting off my water in 5 minutes due to prolonged use of .3 gallons/minute...not gushing, but a good trickle. I searched house for a tuning toilet or faucet and couldn’t find anything...discovered that an outside faucet that was under a snow bank had somehow slightly opened from ice/thaw. Without Moen, that leak would have gone for a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary-Duluth

customer_reviews.title: Water pressure and leaks
customer_reviews.text: This system indicated that our water pressure was spiking throughout the day to extreme highs. It also detected a small drip from one of our bathtubs faucets. A replacement of our water pressure valve solved the spiking of the pressure. We had had a number of pipes break that may have been due to the increased water pressure we would never have discovered until the Moek Flo system was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Mine quit working
customer_reviews.text: Nice app and functionality. But my stopped working after a couple months. The technician said it was not waterproof and should be outside. What? The pictures on their site, however, show it installed outside uncovered. I had to send it back and the sent me a new one. I weatherproofed it myself. Still working after a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kerkes

customer_reviews.title: Go with the Flo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to protect my home from water damage due to plumbing leaks. I used shark bite fittings which made the install much easier. I added an outlet closer to the device but a longer cord is available. I like that it monitors water pressure and water usage. It runs a test at least once a day to detect even the smallest leaks. Using the app, the water can ne shut off from anywhere. I have been pleased with moen products..
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use app
customer_reviews.text: I had my plumber install. He was very impressed with the functions and app readout. Pressure, flow and temp are all important. App works great and I feel like I’m protected.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: This company stands by there product. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: There is a learning period and it will save you thousands if you get a water leak while you are away or you can't see. Great customer service. I am guess they want the feedback to fine tune issues. The $5 a month is well worth it also.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Product detected small drips at first
customer_reviews.text: So when I got this product two weeks ago, I tested it out with small drips from my faucet and it did detect them as leaks. 2-3 weeks later the unit no longer detect drips. The daily tests all come back positive. In short test your unit every so often to confirm its sensitivity. My sensitivity set to high on the online portal and it still not detecting small drips anymore. They are sending me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rolipoli

customer_reviews.title: View software and cost first with a monthly fee!!
customer_reviews.text: Software had a changed which was bad and no way to delete any alerts! Also, to use full software requires a monthly fee! This information about cost was Hidden!
customer_reviews.author: Paul l.

customer_reviews.title: Home saver!!
customer_reviews.text: After my father sustained a $140,000 dollar damage to his home because of a water leak left for 1 day while out of town, I almost had a similar problem if it wasn’t for Flo! On bathroom toilet mega leak. Thankfully $0 dollars in damage just mopping some water in bathroom floor. Highly recommend to have this installed in your home
customer_reviews.author: Kyko Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Bad software!
customer_reviews.text: After in was installed by a certified plumber, it can not be paired with home wifi network after many many many..... trials. Several calls made. I was told that iPhone IOS 13.2 having problem. Finally I was able to partially paired with my old iPhone IOS 12 and subsequent completion with iPhone IOS 13.2.
customer_reviews.author: Pitt Vesom

customer_reviews.title: Well-made product and I believe it will do what it says
customer_reviews.text: I checked around with all of the water showed up devices and they all look too cheap and chintzy. I purchased the Flow by melon and installed it in about an hour and a half. If you don't know anything about Plumbing you need to get somebody who does. Hi hard-sided it in because it is attached to the main of the house. Simple Wi-Fi hookup and I was on my way. I love the app it works fantastic and it paired with a device instantly. So far so good it's pretty cool
customer_reviews.author: John Sarich

customer_reviews.title: Flo is good
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase an automatic water shut off valve for my homeowners insurance. After sending all of the Flo materials to the under writers they ok’d this automatic shut off valve. It was fairly easy to install & the tech support for the app is good. However there are a few glitches in that it tends to want to shut off your water when in most cases you don’t want it shut off. But the valves sensitivity can be modified.
customer_reviews.author: RCW

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Installed in vacation home crawl space. Easy install and web connect. First time I left, discovered the outside faucet was left on low. Turned off whole house water remotely. Probably paid for half the cost already. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Drumheller

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Measures quite a few things. I agree with many comments that the added data breakdown shouldn't cost more. I would be willing to pay something but they are asking too much. My plumber was impressed and will likely be installing these everywhere. Tech support was great, had one issue with installing the app. Simply deleted the app and reinstalled.... problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: CGVI

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed when my sprinkler system ran at an unusual time it recognized the unusual water usage and shut the main and notified me, but now it knows the sprinklers run sometimes at that rate / time. I was expecting this to be based off the water sensors and this is one of the first real AI use cases for home automation that seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sautner

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Easy to monitor and control with APP, BUILT IN intelligence and monitoring. It detected unusual usage and emailed and called me and would have shut off water in 5 mins if no response (was just a really long shower) It does a system pressure test nightly to check for leaks and literally detected a slow drip from a faucet that wasnt completely turned off. Monitors water pressure, usage and incoming water temp too. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: A product that is progressive in water saving approach
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I am a plumbing contractor,I installed this on my house for a test ..works great and I look forward to future purchases
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great that Moen finally did a 1" version. Professional installation highly recommended unless you're experienced at sweating copper pipes. App and WiFi are pretty good, but definitely make sure your wifi reaches where your Flo will be installed!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: All it takes is one bad leak shut down and it pays for itself 10 times over!
customer_reviews.text: Had it installed so, easy. Doing what it's supposed to which is awesome. It relieves a lot of worry and is much quieter (silent) than my old meter.
customer_reviews.author: Rgman0053

customer_reviews.title: Check your existing plumbing carefully!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, love the product. Had some difficulties "fitting" the Moenflo into our existing plumbing site because we had a finished basement. Works as advertised. Support is difficult to contact. Their solution is to throw a bunch of articles and support material when what you want is to talk to a "person".
customer_reviews.author: Hardy J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up on Wi-Fi and straight forward user interface.
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month of use I can see that it will detect even the smallest of leaks. For some reason the model -002 (1 1/4 inch) is nearly twice the price of the smaller 3/4 inch model. This seems high to me. Overall, a good product that should be installed by a professional.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This smart shutoff valve works well. It takes a week or so to learn your usage pattern. It has enough configuration settings to avoid unintended shutoffs or worse, missed leaks. The iOS app could use a few tweaks but nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent D'Amico

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fear leaks or mold!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Installed in a new home, discovered I was using (and wasting) a massive amount of money on my irrigation and was able to find a leak and deal with it. Peace of mind is priceless, and this product will give you that so you won’t fear leaks. You’ll find the goals are encouraging you to also save more water — and money on your water bill.
customer_reviews.author: C. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Feel secure that if there are any leaks, this will stop them
customer_reviews.text: Great app. this will let you sleep well at night that you are protected from any water leaks. It cost me $150 to install it in San Diego. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yolosdca

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working well though. Not sure I'll be paying for the extended features.
customer_reviews.author: Borg King

customer_reviews.title: water pressure& leak monitor
customer_reviews.text: works wonderfully. weekly e mails etc. detected small drip, not obvious to me but upon a search of the house I found it. Would not have known about it until much later when damage was apparent!
customer_reviews.author: R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Works well, cost of unit was high and with cost of installation it was pricey but worth the investment to provide security. Sends me alerts daily to let me know everything is okay. Hopefully I’ll never need to know how well it works
customer_reviews.author: K. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: $20,000 leak repair or this device?  Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Why wouldn’t you own this if u aren’t at the house all the time? People should tell others these exist. We spent about $20,000 on a leak in the downstairs. If only I had known about these....
customer_reviews.author: tgoodnight

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, has been working well for 3 days. It was easy to install using Sharkbite 3/4 connectors. Attached a video of the lights after plugging it in.
customer_reviews.author: Htito

customer_reviews.title: IT works, always know if I have a leak.
customer_reviews.text: This product really does work. You can see whenever you like your water usage. Also if it detects a large amount of water flowing out, it automatically shuts your water off.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: installed by plumber. App easy to dowoad and gives lots of info. Customer support excellent.ime the "sleep" feature for unexpected high use.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Mass

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: 2 months hesitant to buy and install, well not disappointed! fantastic and paired with the smart water detector, you are golden!
customer_reviews.author: VenomTexas

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive product that will save me $$$$$.
customer_reviews.text: Wow... very cool and intelligent. This puts my wife's concerns "at ease". We learned we had a couple of drip leaks and fixed them. So impressed that I will buy another one for my irrigation system. I get charged for a lot of water usage so now i have a way to compare and complain, if needed. Thanks Moen... great product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job protecting home
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a remote vacation home. Flo will monitor plumbing for leaks and if necessary shut off water. Great protection for such a home. As long as wifi is working I can see if plumbing is ok. Easy to install and setup. Have another Flo on my primary home.
customer_reviews.author: RDD

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awsome. A leak could easily cost more than this device. The information and control over my new homes water usage is the beat and super adorable. The app is very nice also, customer support is super fast and polite.
customer_reviews.author: wesley l bickel

customer_reviews.title: this thing works
customer_reviews.text: I installed this valve and have been impressed with how it works. We recently had a drip watering system that was running far more water than normal. This system left me a voice message and an email. I found the problem quickly and saved lots of water and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it allows me to be alert of the water usage
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent. Im using it in a small 6 apartment condo and it works nice. I have some trouble pairing it with my wifi, but once you done, it works perfect. The app is easy to use. Allow some hours after you intall the product to open and close the water flow with your internet conection.
customer_reviews.author: sergio

customer_reviews.title: The product functions as a great defense to water risk
customer_reviews.text: super piece of mind, solid operational control from phone application. Great solid design and mechanism. Recent App update a little less obvious in user operation Single app control by one individual and device is limiting for caretaker and maintenance personnel.
customer_reviews.author: Doug M

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The Flo was easy to install and has been working very well; my only regret is not getting one sooner; I would have saved several time the cost of the unit in wasted water.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mainer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific. !!!
customer_reviews.text: This valve is great and I use it in my home and as well in my business Facility.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Love the Flo by Moen
customer_reviews.text: Best water monitoring and leak detection system in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis B. Meltzer

product_meta.title: Moen 900-001 Flo by Moen 3/4-Inch Smart Water Shutoff
product_meta.description: Size:0.75-Inch| Style:Smart Water ShutoffBring smart plumbing to your Home with Flo by Moen. This Smart Home system is the first water security system that monitors and protects your Home from leaks and water damage with a single device, no additional sensors needed. Designed by plumbing and tech industry professionals, Flo by Moen is installed on the main water supply line of the Home. Through the Flo by Moen mobile app or your web browser, you can see live water use, including water flow rates, pressure and even temperature. If the device detects an issue (e. g. high pressure, freezing water or a small leak) it will alert you through the app so you can fix it before that issue causes damage. If there's a catastrophic failure, like a burst pipe or someone leaves the water running, you'll be alerted in the app allowing you to shut the water off no matter where you are.
feature_bullets: 24/7 PROTECTION: Turn your water on/off from the app manually, or Flo by Moen Smart Water Shutoff will automatically turn off the water for you to protect the home from catastrophic water damage

DAILY LEAK TESTING: MicroLeak Technology proactively monitors the security of the home's entire water system (including behind walls and in foundations) to identify leaks as small as a drop per minute (e.g. pinhole leaks, etc.)
APP DASHBOARD: See how much water you're consuming daily and set conservation goals to encourage saving water and money for your home
SIZE: Model 900-001 fits 3/4-Inch to 1-1/4 Inch pipe diameter (consult a professional)
COMPATIBLE WITH: Alexa skills and Google Assistant; no smart hub or system required; requires Wi-Fi connection; requires standard AC/DC power connection
INSTALLATION INFORMATION: Everything needed for installation is included in box; Professional installation is recommended and takes just a few hours when home meets installation requirements

FLOPROTECT UPGRADE: Get even more out of your Shutoff with FloProtect, a comprehensive subscription service that lets you store and access more of your home water’s data, provides a deductible reimbursement guarantee, and opt-in to professional monitoring

specifications.Included Components: Leak Detection System, Power Adapter, Threaded tailpieces, O-rings, Spacers, Allen wrench/Hex Key
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
